_header: Ye that be becomen wicked and any work will begin
_description: The influence of the planets — seven six-line stanzas with an introductory quatrain, all in couplets

BodRawD939.First Lines:
YE þat be bi comen wikked and eny werke wol byghyneWar
                    ȝow fro þe seueþe planete þat ȝe bi commence nowth
                    þer inne…
BodRawD939.Last Lines:
…& froite forto telie in þe gardayneTo spryngeTo
                    þei þre Mars is a schrewe wiþ owte eny lesynge
BodRawD939.Editions:
Hahn,  A. 
             “Kleine Mitteilungen.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         106 (1901): 351.
